title: ssh: tests don't like multiple cpu values
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

go test -v -cpu 1,2 code.google.com/p/go.crypto/ssh 2>&1 | grep FAIL

What do you see instead?

--- FAIL: TestClientAuthPublickey-2 (0.08 seconds)
--- FAIL: TestClientAuthWrongPassword-2 (0.07 seconds)
--- FAIL: TestClientAuthRSAandDSA-2 (0.08 seconds)
--- FAIL: TestClientHMAC-2 (0.07 seconds)
FAIL
FAIL	code.google.com/p/go.crypto/ssh	5.665s

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

tip
